title: Altar (Shade Catacombs)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Altar of the Damned is located in the central chamber of the Shade Catacombs. Players can sacrifice bleached bones at the altar to recharge their prayer points. Doing so does not provide any Prayer experience.

content:
Altar
Released27 January 2021 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationShade Catacombs
OptionsExamine
ExamineAn ominous altar constructed out of large stone slabs.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID41222

The Altar of the Damned is located in the central chamber of the Shade Catacombs. Players can sacrifice bleached bones at the altar to recharge their prayer points. Doing so does not provide any Prayer experience.
